title_short: (4880) Mondim de Basto - 236 Rua do Caminho da Ponte
description: Nice haven of peace. Possibility of parking at the end of the car park, or at the back, closer to the water. Slightly sloping parking. Be careful, the incline is too steep to access so cars or vans only. Access seems too complicated for motorhomes or vans. There is water but not drinkable. Possibility to swim in this beautiful river and make beautiful dives!

title: (4890) - 50 Rua da Feira
description: Public parking lot, with toilet open all day. In the center of Vila de Fermil de Basto. Calm and secure.

title_short: (4880) Mondim de Basto - 10 Rua Comendador José Augusto Álvares de Carvalho
description: We went to Mondim de Basto during the first week of August.  The campers service area was closed (but possible to use the services) and we slept at this spot close to the urban park. Very quite, in the city center and with lots of entertainment for kids.

address.street: 10 Rua Comendador José Augusto Álvares de Carvalho

title: (4880) Mondim de Basto - Rua Monte Nadouro
title_short: (4880) Mondim de Basto - Rua Monte Nadouro
description: Super cozy private spot, directly on the river, quiet and sorrounded by nature, stayed there for 4 nights without a problem, there is even a little "beach" in the back - very lovely spot.. Even if there is a bit of rubbish on the sides, because some people are just stupid, we just collected it, please do so too, no matter where you are :-)

title: (4890) Carvalho - Unnamed Road
description: Simple spot with a very nice view, go up to the chapel. We struggled in this area to find a nice place to land, that's the best we found. It is asphalted, there is a watchtower with a guard, who watches the fires, we asked him if we could sleep there, no problem. Then few tourists this year in portugal because of the covid and few religious festivals, so we don't know how this place is normally.

title: () Mondim de Basto - EM1189
description: Free service terminal with possibility to stay 72h, attention not accessible the first weekend of August cause big party on the parking lot. Free electricity, do not overuse.

title: (4890) - Unnamed Road
description:
Praia Fluvial de Fermil de Basto.  Nature reserve at the stream 'Rio de Veade'.  Parking on a large surface with fine grit under the trees, possibly up to the stream in which you can enjoy pawing.

Beach is on the other side with restaurant 'Balaia Bar da Praia' / toilets. Open only in summer.

title: (4890) Carvalho - 76 EM616
description: Parking day and night, located in the town of Carvalho, municipality of Celorico de Basto, with restaurant and supermarket. An optimal place to visit the Santuário do Viso and all its surrounding landscape.

title: (4890) Caçarilhe - 2 EM616
description: Small car park near church to avoid on Sundays, calm and quiet

title: (4890) - N210
description: Parking near a small church in the center of a small village. We had a very quiet night. In the morning it is nice to see the beautiful panoramic view.

title: (4820) São Gens - Rua do Viso
description: Monte da Sra do Viso, Celorico de Basto, with a spectacular view of the surrounding villages. Lots of shade and lots of space. Ideal to enjoy all spaces. Serra do viso. Lots of good accessories.

name: Quinta do Rio - Natuurcamping
title: (4890-140) Quinta do Rio - Natuurcamping
description: An incredibly idyllic campsite on a river, far away from civilisation. The last part of the path that leads there is only gravel and quite steep in some places. Also the last 3 km of directions from google maps is not correct but there are signs pointing the right way. The owner is Dutch and built everything here piece by piece, because previously there were only terraced vineyards here.

name: MICROCAMPING AT LAVOURA DA BOUÇA FARM
title: (4890) MICROCAMPING AT LAVOURA DA BOUÇA FARM
title_short: (4890) MICROCAMPING AT LAVOURA DA BOUÇA FARM
description:
Microcamping, at "farm" private terrain. At our farm you can park one or two motorhome (small size), and enjoy shade and free animals. If you have a tent can alo camp near bouças. Mostly apple, we have the best organic applejuice, no sugar or conservatives added. Also can enjoy country nature, sheep's and geese on the wild. We have a swing by the lake. Can visit and bathe at our rivermill. We have other places to park. 
for reservation please call or check the web.

name: MICROCAMPING AT REQUEIXO TERRAIN
title: (4890) MICROCAMPING AT REQUEIXO TERRAIN
description: Microcamping, at "Requeixo" private terrain. Park for one or two motorhome (bigger vans), at lupine farming. Nearby "lavoura da bouça - fruta bio" farm. Can visit rivermill, bathe on river, enjoy countryside. Taste our 100% organic applejuice (no added sugar niether conservatives), and enjoy the wild sheeps, geese, swing, and other places nearby, organic products, applejuice. Also have a parked caravan for support. For reservation please call or check the website.

title: (4890) - 1245 N210
description: Very safe park. Near exists a market and a coffe. Exists a old railway station near and a path to Walk.

title: (4890) - 661 EM617
description: Parking park in Borba da Montanha, Celorico de Basto. A lot of boom to park, boom to stay. Secure calm. Cafes and supermarkets. Very nice agricultural area.

title: (4880) Mondim de Basto -
description: Quiet place for one night. The descent here is a bit steep and narrow, but also manageable with larger vehicles. A little further down is a river that is safe to use for cooling off in summer. You can start various hikes from here and the trees also offer shade. The night was extremely quiet, almost no cars drive along here.

name: MICROCAMPING AT KIWIS-RIBAS
title: (4890) MICROCAMPING AT KIWIS-RIBAS
description: Microcamping, at "kiwis - ribas" private terrain. At ribas you can enjoy private, exclusive nature. For summer/ sunny season. With one or two places for small motorhome (van type)*. Can enjoy river with different small depths, barbecue area, small lake, cascade, kiwis shadow, solar shower, electricity. Exclusive and few people. Only reserved per group. For reservation contact first. (*if with a bigger motorhome and limoeiros house is available, you can park bigger van there, and camp on the valley. The street valley with high slope, more adaptable for smaller vans. access requires experienced driver). Can visit our farm, organic producst, applejuice, wine, rivermills, nearby.

title: (4880) Mondim de Basto - Rua da Senhora da Graça
title_short: (4880) Mondim de Basto - Rua da Senhora da Graça
description: At an altitude of almost 1000m, the view is breathtaking at 360° over the entire region. Lots of people during the day on weekends. We spent a solitary and very quiet night. It is a starting point for paragliding.

title: (4600-005) Amarante - Avenida Primeiro de Maio
description:
Car park with overnight stays tolerated.
Next to Municipal Market and Market Café. Not possible on market days (Wednesday and Saturday from 04:00 - 15:00.

There are public toilets open from 08:00-20:00 and water may be available inside the market.

Lovely setting beside the river with easy access to the historic town.

Approach car park from the main road bridge. Do not let your GPS try to take you via the old bridge as the turn into the parking is nearly impossible even for our 5m van!

They also have a outdoorsports organasation, a lot of things to do at the lake and in the mountains surrounding the campsite I recomend this place to everyone, you or old, their things to do for everyone!

title: (4635) Várzea da Ovelha e Aliviada - Unnamed Road
title_short: (4635) Várzea da Ovelha e Aliviada - Unnamed Road
description:
Tranquility,  and magnificent landscape, this is our house at the gates of the beautiful and historic city of Amarante.
We would like it to be a great starting point for getting to know our beautiful region. Here are some suggestions for planning your trip.
We are located 10 minutes from the main node of national motorways that can take you to Porto, Guimarães, Braga, Vila Real, Lamego, Bragança, Chaves and many other cities of great historical and tourist interest. You may use direct public transport for some of them.
Amarante is our city. Small, with a rich historical center, crossed by the river Tâmega, cradle of the conventual sweets and center of a unique wine region, the Vinho Verde region.
And because we talk about wine, of course you can not miss the region of the Douro Valley, a landscape treasure that is the origin of the Port.
If you are nature lovers I have two suggestions of national parks: Gerês and Alvão. And, of course, the mountainous set that will be here in front, in the landscape of the terrace: the Marão.
But we will have an opportunity to talk about all this.
See you later!

name: Quinta Rural Eco-lodge, Bungalows e Glamping de Montanha

title_short: (4860) Quinta Rural Eco-lodge, Bungalows e Glamping de Montanha

Serra da Aboboreira.
Banhos publicos chaves no café Marão à Vista

title: (4640) - Rua Cabo de Vila

title: (4870) Ribeira de Pena - 1873 N206
description:
Park next to the road with plenty of space. A little uneven. It has a tap with water, 2 barbecues and bathrooms (they were closed when I was there).
Good view over the dam.
quiet place

title: (5000) Vila Real - EM313
description: At the edge of the road (can frequented) placement small but superb view. No good service for one night

title: (4640) - Unnamed Road
description: High altitude chapel of great beauty seen clear on the Haut-Douro. Heavy truck 4x4 access. Is it a fire engine route? track recorded on Wikiloc

title: (4600) Carneiro -
description: Small esplanade of dry grass along an isolated path. Very little traffic. A bit windy but great view

title: (4870) Ribeira de Pena Portugalia - 2 Rua do Rapaduro
title_short: (4870) Ribeira de Pena Portugalia - 2 Rua do Rapaduro
description: less than a kilometer from the highway, 7 picnic tables, small horizontal parking lot at the side of the road, a shallow river to cool off in, a barbecue area with grill.

title: (4605) Real - 618 Rua Doutor Joaquim da Silva Cunha
title_short: (4605) Real - 618 Rua Doutor Joaquim da Silva Cunha
description: Nice little parking lot in paved ground Very quiet I only stayed for lunch but I'm sure we can stay the night No service hard this parking lot

address.street: 618 Rua Doutor Joaquim da Silva Cunha

title: (4810) Calvos - 1541 Rua da Lapinha
description: Picnic area next to a sanctuary with parking spaces suitable for long vans. Fountain with drinking water and rubbish bins. Very calm.

title: (4810) Calvos - 350 EM579 2
description: Parking in the ground, near the Lapinho sanctuary. No services, but the possibility of spending the night. View of the valley. Only concern, the sanctuary rings every hour ...?

title: (4635) Toutosa - 28 Rua Toutosa
description: Nice place in the center of a calm village, shop on the square and a public toilet available.

title: (5000) Vila Real - E82
description: "Barragem do Sordo" Calm place with a dam surrounded by mountains. Restaurants nearby. Easy access to the highway. Beautiful spot for lunch and a swim. Road was a little steep and gravel but it you take it slow it is very achievable and heaps of space to turn at the bottom. worth it!

title: (5030) - CM1244
description: Praia Fluvial de Fornelos, free public parking.

title: (4870) Ribeira de Pena - N206
description: Place next to a mountain road, beautiful views of the river and suitable for a stop to eat or rest in the shade of the trees.

title: (4870) - Unnamed Road
description: Park parking "Pene Aventura".  Night possible without problem.  If you share in the activities of the park, you have free hot water and showers.  You can enjoy one of the best zip lines in the world!

title: (4560-055) Castelões - A4
description: Gas station parking. There is a well reserved place where you can spend the night

title: (4810) Infantas - 189 Travessa 24 de Junho
description: Quite location by the wood on meadow. Hard to camp anywhere around. No service here.

title: (4560) Penafiel - 260 Rua Bento Peixoto
description: Drinking water point, easy to fill water bottle

title: (4850) Vieira do Minho - N205
description: Water source on the street, with parking opposite. The water tastes very mineral, similar to the Portuguese LUSO.

name: Quinta da Magantinha
title: (4620-620) Quinta da Magantinha
description: In this wine estate which is also a bed and breakfast, you can take advantage of closed and secure parking. Sufficient space for motorhome, van, car. A breakfast can be offered to you. Send a message to find out availability before coming.

title: (5000-651) Vila Real - 58 Rua da Fonte Nova
title_short: (5000-651) Vila Real - 58 Rua da Fonte Nova
description: Next to the very calm primary school. 10 minutes walk from the city center.

title: (5000-410) Vila Real - 16 Rua de Montezelos
description: Automatic laundromat! very clean and very practical. There is a monaural for the exchange of banknotes. Laundry is included. TV and free WiFi. Air conditioning can be parked in front near the electrical transformer

title: (5000) Vila Real - 2-17 Rua Lugar da Fraga
title_short: (5000) Vila Real - 2-17 Rua Lugar da Fraga
description: Large parking paved quiet, a few trees, perfect to rest for a night. no service, nothing to visit, just the view of the big bridge over the gorges of the little river Corgo.

title: (5000-651) Vila Real - 13 Praceta Dom João Evangelista
title_short: (5000-651) Vila Real - 13 Praceta Dom João Evangelista
description: Residential parking with plenty of free spaces, more or less flat and very close to the center. It is payable on weekdays (0.60 an hour until 7:00 p.m.) We have slept here without problems.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 9 Rua Nossa Senhora da Penha
title_short: (4810) Guimarães - 9 Rua Nossa Senhora da Penha
description: Parking easily accessible and with a lot of shade. It is a very quiet and endearing area just 10 minutes from Guimaraes.

title: (5040) Sedielos -
description: Good area in the middle of the Douro next to the Marão mountain range with beautiful ladscapes. Be sure to visit the Pituda leisure Park with beautiful river beach.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 17 N101-2
description: Below another car park opposite the restaurants, this car park is quieter and better equipped for spending the night. We found a flat spot next to the big rock.

title: (4820) Travassós -
description: Flat, calm, open view, 4G ok, easy to access. We spent a peaceful night. The road in the distance is not very busy. Depending on the direction of the wind, you can hear the original bell tower of a church in the distance. The place is clean please take care of it.

name: Parque Campismo de Penha
title: (4810) Parque Campismo de Penha
description: Great campsite with pool and restaurant. Very friendly staff. Shaded and in the trees. At the top of the gondola/cable car so perfect for visiting this beautiful little town and the rock structures of Penha.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 8 Rua Nossa Senhora da Penha
title_short: (4810) Guimarães - 8 Rua Nossa Senhora da Penha
description:
Large car park at the Santuario de Penha. Very nice and quiet
Beautiful Sunset and View

title: (4810) Guimarães - N101-2
description: Free camper pitch, only for parking

title: (4810) Guimaraes - R. das 3 Bicas
description: Semi-quiet, many couples go up, good to spend the day, safe, incredible views

title: (4810) Guimarães - 56 Rua Monte de Santa Catarina
title_short: (4810) Guimarães - 56 Rua Monte de Santa Catarina
description: Just outside the entrance to the official camping (Parque Campismo da Penha) is a relatively large parking lot with convenient parking spaces of no fixed length. Lots of shade. Avoid driving uphill from the north (Quintas) as there are steep inclines and narrow streets. Better access if you drive from near Guimaraes center. Public toilets are a short walk away towards the main car park and church (unknown opening hours).

title: (4810-000) Guimaraes - Unnamed Road
description: On the road to the campsite, 200 meters before arriving at the parking lot, you will find a path that goes down to a picnic table. If you ever miss the path you will see the spot which is just below the road. We spent a very good night there in peace and the next day we took advantage of the shade of the trees and the walks and monuments nearby. The spot is only accessible for one small van.

title: (4820) Travassós -
description: Small park with a splendid view! Picnic table, small chapel.

title: (5000-305) Vila Real - Rua de Santa Iria
title_short: (5000-305) Vila Real - Rua de Santa Iria
description: A good place to go to night. If you don't like cemeteries, don't come because it's next to you.

title: (5000-651) Vila Real - N16 Rua de São Dinis
title_short: (5000-651) Vila Real - N16 Rua de São Dinis
description: Parking with easy access via avenida Carvalho Araujo. belvedere on the Corgo ravine.

title: (5000) Mesão Frio - N2
description: Nice spot for a picnic during the road trip for the EN2

name: Vila Real Camping
title: (5000-557) Vila Real Camping
description: The campsite is about 1 km from the town center on a hill with lots of trees. squares. There is everything you need. The place is clean and well managed. Very friendly welcome.

title: (4620) Rio Tinto - 342 N207-2
description: Simple parking 250 m from Caide train station to take the train to Pinhao. Departure 8:50 arrival 11:37. Return departure 16h23 arrival 18h25. The train runs along the Douro on 85% of the way, beautiful! And in the opposite direction Porto is 40 minutes.

title: (5000-557) Vila Real - 31 Avenida da Europa
description: Overview of the time in the trees, the time of departure and the duration of the harvest (Junho a Setembro).  Most cases can be solved.  Muito calmo.  Free

title: (5000) Vila Real - 38 Avenida 5 de Outubro
description: Around the park and playground for children, there is room to park the motorhome. We did not spend the night because there was a student party for the carnival in a tent in the university area and there was a lot of noise but on another date that did not have the party, the place is very good, you cross the bridge and you are in the historic center, walking, in ten minutes you are there. The place that puts another partner we used to sleep but is far from the city.

title: (4640) Porto - N101
description: This parking is interesting because it has a source of drinking water. The locals come to use it.

title: (4640) Campelo - 18 Rua do Montinhal
description:
New and free motorhomearea.
The service area is new. There are no signs indicating where it is. It is behind the municipal swimming pools and the sports hall.  Three places.

title: (5000-573) Mesão Frio -
description: Parking very basic, but convenient for large vehicles, no shade. and close to the auto circuit (during the wtcr) for access to the paddocks.

title: (4640) Campelo - R. Abel Ribeiro
description: Very nice place for a picnic. Most pitches are sloping but there is shade. The showers and toilets were very clean. bring paper!

title: (5000-542) Vila Real - Rua Actor Ruy de Carvalho
title_short: (5000-542) Vila Real - Rua Actor Ruy de Carvalho
description: Parking at the entrance to Parque do Corgo. In addition to shopping. Very peaceful place where we could spend 2 fantastic nights. Drinking water is available free of charge, but barrels are required for filling. No unloading points.

title: (4870) Ribeira de Pena - N312
description: Outside the campsite. Simple stop night, calm, flat.

title: (5000) Vila Real - Rua Jaime Campos
description: Parking near Vila Real. Quiet. Without services Cafeterias nearby.

title: (5000) Vila Real - 67 Rua da Vila Paulista
title_short: (5000) Vila Real - 67 Rua da Vila Paulista
description: Washer and dryer

title: (5000) Vila Real -
description: It is next door to Decathlon, the hypermarket and the combustion pump. This manual is available in the city center. Very calm for one night. During the day as a hypermarket it is moving a lot. Washing and drying machines inside Intermarché

title: (4805) Tabuadelo - 244 Rua de São Cipriano
description:
A magnificent place surrounded by nature in the countryside but close to the urban center of Guimarães. The owner allows walks through the surrounding woods.
The site has a black and grey discharge center and a water charging point.
There is a cafe and grocery store very close and a supermarket less than 5 minutes away with a gas station.
The owner is still carrying out the construction of the space but already allows its use.
Contact: 960085233

title: (5000-105) Vila Real - 18 Rua Doutor Manuel de Arriaga
title_short: (5000-105) Vila Real - 18 Rua Doutor Manuel de Arriaga
description: Rangers did not allow us to camp in the nature reserve. The road to the cemetery was open and after driving around we came across this place. Bench across the street. Garbage bin nearby.

title: (4870) Ribeira de Pena - 765 N312
description: Service area and simple parking. Filling water with token and playground for small children, shops nearby, good walk on the bridge.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 147 Rua José Faria Martins
description: Perfect place to visit the city. The parking lot is located directly at the valley station of the cable car to Serra da Pehna. The access road is not very wide. And the places quite narrow and short.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 354 Rua Professor Egas Moniz
description: Shaded street and flat to spend the day and night. Attention garage on the cob so difficult for more than six meters. Park and city center nearby.

name: Camping "Quinta das Corujeiras"
title: (4640) Camping "Quinta das Corujeiras"
description: Camping "Quinta das Corujeiras" A campsite offering only one place for a small van, rather difficult to access but in the middle of the vineyards: reservation highly recommended. Great location with hammock available. Showers and toilets very clean. No services for camper. Very welcome with proposal for a ride in the middle of a river to reach a small waterfall. Bread order possible.

title: (4810) Guimarães - Rua Bernardino Jordão
description: Day / night parking on dirt adjacent to the official parking area. Suitable if you have vehicles longer than 6.5 meters. A short distance away (50 meters) there are the loading and unloading columns of the parking area. The historic center is about 8-10 minutes on foot

title: (4810-025) Guimarães - Rua do Rei Pegu
description: Day parking for long vehicles, ideal for visiting the city, about 15 minutes from the center on foot. Busy during the day and without services.

title: (4810) Guimarães - Rua do Rei Pegu
description:
Parking area in cord. Free parking. One way street and very well located.
We have been here two days and no problem.
At the foot of the funicular and 15 minutes walking, with children of the Castle.

title: (4640-187) Baião - 127 Rua Camões
description: Piece of land right next to galp gas station (with laundry machines). it's right next to the road but on a much lower level. fine to spend a night.

title: (5000-781) Vilarinho de Samardã -
description: A good pull in to stop to admire the view and have a picnic. Very peaceful.

title: (4820) Agrela - 98 Avenida de Santa Cristina
description: Field, parking in front of a small pond. perfect for cooling off. A little wooded, next to the church.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 220C Parque das Hortas
description: The other parking was used for a funfair, so we took this car park. I only recommend it in case of emergency, it is very noisy. Do not hesitate to use the cable car to explore the old town ...

title: (4810-534) Guimarães - 1282 Avenida Dom João IV
description: Free car park next to Guimaraes train station. Shopping center and supermarket 3 minutes, Palacio Cultural Center Vila Flor 5 minutes walk.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 36 Rua de Dona Mafalda
description:
Very large free parking in front of the castle. Lots of trees and shaded places. No parking from 21:00 to 07:00.

Ps: this is NOT the battlefield of the battle of Sao Mamede. Google Maps lies :>>

title: (4810) Guimarães - 15 Rua Dona Urraca
description: It is a fairly wide street where you can stop the motorhome, without traffic and overlooking the castle of Guimaraës. It is very quiet, the only thing that you can not park from 9:00 pm to 7:00 am, so you can not stay overnight. 50 meters from the castle.

title: (5000) Vila Real - Rua Padre Miranda
description: Parking behind the church overlooking the vineyards and close to the Mateus Manor. No service but a little shade.

title: (4810-225) Guimarães - 493 Rua Camilo Castelo Branco
description: Rammed earth car park, in a quiet residential area a stone's throw from the historic center. Quiet night.

title: (4850) Guilhofrei - Unnamed Road
description: Small corner for two vehicles possible, in the woods at the edge of the water.

title: (4800-432) Guimarães - 1 Largo Martins Sarmento
description: Next to palace drinking fountain for water bottles

title: () Vila Real - N322-1
description: Parking for 2 motorhomes without any service. View over the vines.

title: (4815) Vizela - 629 N106
description: Optimal quiet park to visit Parque das Termas de Vizela. Pingo Doce supermarket, 100m away.

title: (5000) Vila Real - 133 Rua das Flores
description: Small car park opposite the manor of Mateus, on the place of the wash-house. Access quite narrow. 2/3 places. Quiet but traffic noise from 6am in the morning.

title: (5030) Santa Marta de Penaguião - 41 Alameda 13 de Janeiro
title_short: (5030) Santa Marta de Penaguião - 41 Alameda 13 de Janeiro
description: Parking without service, very nice and quiet. Suitable for any motorhome. We had a quiet night. Shops and restaurants nearby.

title: (4850) Albufeira da Barragem - Albufeira da Barragem do
title_short: (4850) Albufeira da Barragem - Albufeira da Barragem do
description: Really nice place next to the lake. There is a small bar, nothing else apart from that. Stayed one night, we were the only ones, absolute silence, no disturbances. Also very calm in the morning. The access road is asphalt, but is a sloppy one.

title: (4870) Ribeira de Pena - CM1132
description: Spectacular views. There are several taps and none of them have water. There are no containers, but there are litter bins nearby, in the church. Residential and quiet place.

title: (5040) Mesão Frio - 305 Caminho Jardim
description: Small parking lot, we just landed kk instant but possible to sleep I think, pleasant.

title: (4620-696) Lousada - 1 Rua General Humberto Delgado
description:
Only Vehicles <3500 kg

Paved and illuminated parking lot (50x200 mtr) in the center of Lousada.  Opposite municipal swimming pool and fresh market.  Slightly inclined and close to a traffic road.  Lots of high trees.

title: (4800-073) Azurém - 442 Rua Teixeira de Pascoais
description: Laundromat with wifi

title: (4800-073) Guimarães -
description: Large public car park at Guimaraes football stadium. Supermarket and old center 5 minutes walk.

title: (4835-010) Guimarães - 703 Rua Professor Abel Salazar
description: Free parking spaces, at the front of the apartments, suitable for small camper vans <6 mtr. On the other side a large shopping center.

title: (4850) - N304
description: Beautiful beach, with shading, on the lake, lawn and lake on each side, ski lift for wakeboarding at 50 m, few people the day, nobody at night, small bar with draft beer, seen at the top, access a bit difficult, dirt road on 100 m but do not hesitate to go to the very bottom. Lake water very clean and warm at will

title: (4800) - 1220 Rua Portelinha
description: Small roadside parking lot with little traffic. Nice and quiet view for the night. Slight slope but with the holds no problems. Facing a cute church whose bell tower remains silent at night. It nevertheless resumes at 7 a.m. so perfect if you take the road early, perhaps annoying if you get up late. No dogs barking at night, which seems to be rare enough in the area to clarify this.

title: () Santa Marta de Penaguião - 5030 EM601 1
description:
Motorhome service and parking area.
Completely new with everything you need to perform maintenance on your motorhome.
Free parking. Great views.
Very quiet place.

title: (5000-781) Vilarinho de Samardã -
description: source of drinking water

title: (5040) Gafaria - N108
description: View point parking with a small buffet

title: (5040) Mesão Frio - N101
description: We stopped by chance on this parking near the cemetery, calm assured! Go to the bottom of the car park, breathtaking views of the Douro Valley. The village is above.
